name: Project-2
description: <!---USER STORY---> As a user I want to sign in to an app that stores and tracks fitness goals. As a user I want to be able to save my own fitness routines, or select something from a pre formed list. As a user I want to track what excercises I do during a day, or set reminders (some sort of calendar function) As a user I want the app to build and securely save my profile (including what I did, when, reps, set, etc.) As a user I want to be able to add notes or comments to the stuff somewhere in the app (maybe).
